title: Using Pings is Apparently Against the Rules
body:
Couldn't figure out how to attach an image so here's the copy/pasta

From: Riot Games
Hey Accursêd,

Please do not encourage others to break in-game rules.

Your removed content:

nah you have to go for the subtle shit like

spam pinging the bounty of their laner when they start talking shit

I'd like to emphasize that this is not a warning; however, please take some time to familiarize yourself with the Boards Universal Rules, as well as the guidelines for any sub-board you intend to post in before you do so.

If you have any questions about this moderation action, don't hesitate to reach out to the Boards Moderation Team via:

The NA Boards Discord
The Discuss the Boards sub-board
-- Periscope


using their in game pings for communication is against the rules :)))

replies.body:
From the **Universal Rules:**

>Do not post content advocating or soliciting violations of the Terms of Use, Summoner’s Code, or Board Rules. Players encouraging this sort of behavior will be punished as if they had engaged in it themselves.

This is clearly an attempt to instruct other players on ways to harass other players that the system isn't as capable of catching, and, as such, is definitely not allowed.
Using excessive pings to harass people is against the rules, like any form of distracting spam or flaming.

that isnt using pings to communicate with your team, thats just being an ass and hiding behind pings.

pings are meant to convey actual information not to be a secondary way for you to insult your team.
lowkey i actually cant tell you how many times ive pinged an enemy's bounty and my allies assumed i was flaming them.
